definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: In the reality, it's gonna never happen.
sentences.chinese: 而今害怕那真实得无法挣脱的梦境。

sentences.english: Now his darkly comic sensibility is penetrating a temple of high culture.
sentences.chinese: 而今他的黑暗的喜剧元素，进入了高雅文化的殿堂。

sentences.english: Churches are now too often destructive battlegrounds of an ideological right and left.
sentences.chinese: 而今教堂往往成为意识形态左右派相斗的消极战场。

sentences.english: Now visitors to the reserve will have a chance to witness the same.
sentences.chinese: 而今，到保护区的游客们同样有机会目睹这样的美景。

sentences.english: Nowadays, summer camp is even more specialized.
sentences.chinese: 现而今，暑期夏令营则变得更为专向化。

sentences.english: Today we shingl study the text first: then I'll ask you a few pre-determined questions.
sentences.chinese: 而今大师先看课文，然后我问几个问题。

sentences.english: The former as a target of mountainside depressions, now has established a milepost.
sentences.chinese: 那昔日当作目标的山腰洼地，而今已树立起里程碑。

sentences.english: Now, the city-state wants its citizens to just be... nicer.
sentences.chinese: 而今，这个“城国”又想让其国民变得更加友善一些。

sentences.english: Xia Hongfang concerned about Exchange rate every day in the past, now full of pollution-free.
sentences.chinese: 夏红芳过去每天关心汇率，而今满口无公害。

sentences.english: The song dynasty first gold medal woman killer, now through modern online, ???????
sentences.chinese: 宋朝第一金牌女杀手，而今穿越现代网游，什么？

sentences.english: Now he dreaded indeed those ideas that had then opened to him boundless vistas of light.
sentences.chinese: 而今甚至害怕回顾那些向他揭示无限光明前途的思绪。

sentences.english: Today the remains of these "ghost towns" are scattered about Death Valley.
sentences.chinese: 而今的人去房空的“鬼城”散落在死亡谷上。

sentences.english: Now, the lovely girl, wearing of wild flowers small princess?
sentences.chinese: 而今，那个可爱的丫头，戴着野花的小公主哪儿去了？

sentences.english: By now I should know better, your dreams are never free.
sentences.chinese: 而今我已明白，你的绮梦无法放心。

sentences.english: She was now arrayed in the most costly garments, all silk and muslin.
sentences.chinese: 而今她穿上了丝绸和细纱裁制的珍贵服饰。

sentences.english: But I was young and foolish, and now i m full of tears.
sentences.chinese: 但我当年年幼无知，而今热泪盈眶。

definition: things change with the passage of time (idiom)
that being the case/then/in that case
just a while before/not so long ago/everyone can remember when..
